short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly track and sync your manga/manhua reading progress across devices!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your manga and manhua reading progress effortlessly! This extension helps you stay organized by saving the current chapter of all your favorite titles and syncing your progress across multiple devices. Never lose your place again, whether you're reading at home or on the go!
